result.title: 1. Problem in solution
result.content:
[Edit 2: added comments with respect to input. I do not think problem statement or logic is relevant because the problem occurs right after reading inputs (as what I know). All other comments were added as a part of debugging activity. Downvotes are okay, give your reason though. If any clarity is required please comment]

[Edit 1 : the issue is not with the problem statement or the logic. Its just that when you read the inputs as given above, the program execution never comes out of the loop reading the inputs, ie, cout<<"bp-1"<<"\n"; never gets executed. [Please look into the big comment line in code, the loop above comment reads input]. I hope the issue is clear now.]

I was solving some problem from Codechef on Hackerrank's online IDE. The problem is that the code freezes (kind of) during run time. [Check output after code]

Here is the code: 

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int n,m1; 
    cin>>n>>m1;  //reads 4 and 6
    cout<<n<<m1; //prints 4 and 6
    vector<vector<int> > ad(n+9);       
    map<pair<int,int>,int> m;
    pair<int,int> p;
    pair<pair<int,int>,int> q;
    vector<pair<pair<int,int>,int>> m2;

//ideally the following loop should break after i=6 but it doesnt and causes Runtime error

    for(int i=0;i<m1;i++){
        cout<<i;           // displays iteration number i
        //cout<<"bp-2 : "<<i<<"\n";
        int e1,e2,cn;int cn1;
        //cin.clear();
        cin>>e1>>e2>>cn;  // read the first three parameters on the next line and checks on cn
      //  cout<<e1<<e2<<cn;
        if(cn==0){       //perform some task when cn=0
        //cout<<e1<<e2<<cn;
        ad[e1].push_back(e2);
            ad[e2].push_back(e1);
        if(i==m1-1)break;
        }
        else{
         //   cout<<cn1;
            cin>>cn1;         // read the fourth input when cn=1
         //   cout<<cn1;
        //    cout<<"bp-2 : "<<i<<"in loop : "<<e1<<' '<<e2<<' '<<cn<<' '<<cn1<<"\n";
            p = make_pair(e1,e2);
            //cout<<"\nhh1";
            q = make_pair(p,cn1);
           // cout<<"\nhh";
            if(!m[p])
            m[p] =cn1;
            m2.push_back(q);
            cout<<i<<' '<<m.size()<<' '<<m2.size()<<endl; // displays loop iteration number and size of m , m2
  //          cout<<"\nhh3";
            //cout<<flush;
         //   cin.ignore(100);
            if(i==m1-1)break;            
        }        
    }
//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
// DOESNT COMES OUT HERE ***************************************************************************************//
//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
    cout<<"bp-1"<<"\n"; // this line is not printed;
    vector<int> vis(n+1,0);
    vector<vector<int> > cc;
    vector<int> cc1;
    vector<int> nbr;
    int kl=1;
 //   cout<<"bp0"<<"\n";
    ll:    
    nbr.push_back(kl);
    vis[kl]=1;
    l:
    for(int i=0;i<ad[kl].size();i++){
        if(vis[ad[kl][i]]!=1){
        nbr.push_back(ad[kl][i]);
        vis[ad[kl][i]]=1;
        }
    }
    cc1.push_back(nbr[0]);
    nbr.erase(nbr.begin());    
    if(nbr.size()!=0){
        kl=nbr[0];goto l;
    }
    else{
        if(count(vis.begin()+1,vis.end(),0)!=0){
            kl=find(vis.begin()+1,vis.end(),0)-vis.begin();
            cc.push_back(cc1);
            for(int i1=0;i1<cc1.size();i1++)cout<<cc1[i1]<<' ';
            cc1.clear();
            
            goto ll;
        }
        cc.push_back(cc1);
        cc1.clear();
    }
    sort(m2.begin(),m2.end(),[](pair<pair<int,int>,int> &l,pair<pair<int,int>,int> &r){return l.second<r.second;});
 //   cout<<"bp1"<<"\n";
    int cntt=0;
    int fc=0,sc=0,flag2=1,flag1=1,fi=-1,si=-1;  
 //   cout<<"bp2 cc.size(): "<<cc.size()<<"\n";
    if(cc.size()==1)cout<<0;
    else {
        for(vector<pair<pair<int,int>,int>>::iterator it;it!=m2.end();it++){
            flag2=flag1=1;
            for(int i=0;i<cc.size()&&(flag1||flag2);i++){                
                if(flag1&&find(cc[i].begin(),cc[i].end(),it->first.first)!=cc[i].end()){fi=i;fc=find(cc[i].begin(),cc[i].end(),it->first.first)-cc[i].begin();flag1=0;}
                if(flag2&&find(cc[i].begin(),cc[i].end(),it->first.second)!=cc[i].end()){si=i;sc=find(cc[i].begin(),cc[i].end(),it->first.second)-cc[i].begin();flag2=0;}
            }
            if(m[make_pair(fc,sc)])cntt+=m[make_pair(fc,sc)];
            else cntt+=m[make_pair(sc,fc)];
            cc1=cc[fi];
            cc[si].insert(cc[si].end(),cc1.begin(),cc1.end());
            cc[fi].clear();
            
        }
        cout<<cntt;
    }
    
}

and the output: 

_**Runtime error**_
**Input (stdin)**
4 6
1 2 0
1 3 1 4
1 4 1 1
2 3 1 2
2 4 1 5
3 4 1 3
**Your Output**
46011 1 1
22 2 2
33 3 3
44 4 4
55 5 5

The code pauses after loop (as mentioned above in code). What could I possibly be missing? Thank You.
